A simple extension for those who are tired of the way Google Drive looks.

The design was based on Pablo Fernando Caprio's
 concept art, you can check out his other amazing works at this link: https://dribbble.com/pablographics
https://www.behance.net/PabloGraphics12

Soon I will be adding new features and customization options so that you can adapt the appearance of google drive to better fit your taste.
